name: Luc Valencia
text: Mind you, most of the "criminals" killed by Davao death squads were engaged on petty crimes, not even those big time violent gangs/ organized crime groups. Can you point to one example where DUdirty actually eliminated a drug king pin or a leader/member of terrorist/ kidnapping group?

source_obj.text: Mind you, most of the "criminals" killed by Davao death squads were engaged on petty crimes, not even those big time violent gangs/ organized crime groups. Can you point to one example where DUdirty actually eliminated a drug king pin or a leader/member of terrorist/ kidnapping group?
